page.title: 01Introduction to Stoke Park
page.content: The Northern part of the area consists mainly of residential buildings on two estates, one private and one council,on the outskirts of Ipswich. The Southern sector is made up of park land and arable farmland. During the course of the survey 167 households replied to questionnaires sent out by the pupils of five schools. Results were recorded under the follow- ing headings: RECREATION, CLUBS, ENTERTAINMENT,MEDIA, HOLIDAYS, HOME LIFE, COMMUNICATIONS, TRANSPORT, EDUCATION, TRADE, RELIGION, HEALTH. Respondents were also invited to write comments on any LOCAL CONCERNS. The next pages summarise the findings of the questionnaire; remaining pages highlight the character of the area and include contributions from local children. Peter Payn, Stoke High.
